title: The Broncos' Blunder
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss if the Broncos were right to kick a field goal instead of giving Russell Wilson the ball with the game on the line, if Robert Saleh’s confidence in the Jets is justified and their thoughts on Suns owner Robert Sarver’s fine and suspension following an investigation.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: Robert Sarver is fined and suspended following an investigation and were the Broncos right to kick a field goal?
